GSD.description:
netfilter: conntrack: revisit gc autotuning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 592e57591826f3d09c28d755a39ea8e9d13705ad. For more details please see the references link.
